comment: Asst Dir Gen of WHO, Bruce Aylward, described China as "'the first line of defense for international spread of this virus'. He highly praised the country's fundamental control measures, especially placing a lockdown on Wuhan to prevent the further spread of the virus."  2/
@tingdc @mrbcyber WHO is deep in Beijings pockets, or rather to say far up Beijings ass.

"Although the rest of the world was not ready for the outbreak during the "window" China created for them, it's never too late to get this under control, Aylward said."  The Chinese government has pledged $20 million to WHO to help w/ global #COVID response efforts. 3/
Tedros, WHO's director-general, "expressed his gratitude and appreciation to the Chinese government for its generosity by extending a helping hand to other developing countries." 4/4
